func:
/*
//home/pi/rpi-rgb-led-matrix/examples-api-use/scrolling-text-example -s 0 --led-rows=64 --led-cols=64 --led-chain=2 --led-brightness=50 --led-slowdown-gpio=3 -f /home/pi/rpi-rgb-led-matrix/fonts/10x20.bdf ' ♥Thank you♥ ' --led-no-hardware-pulse -C255,145,0"
//./led-image-viewer --led-rows=64 --led-cols=64 --led-chain=2 -f -w10 /*.png --led-no-hardware-pulse --led-gpio-mapping="adafruit-hat" -C --led-brightness=10 --led-slowdown-gpio=3
///home/pi/rpi-rgb-led-matrix/examples-api-use/scrolling-text-example -s 0 --led-rows=64 --led-cols=64 --led-chain=2 --led-brightness=50 --led-slowdown-gpio=3 -f /home/pi/rpi-rgb-led-matrix/fonts/10x20.bdf " ♥Thank you♥ " --led-no-hardware-pulse -C255,145,0
///home/pi / rpi - rgb - led - matrix / examples - api - use / scrolling - text - example - s 0 --led - rows=64 --led - cols=64 --led - chain=2 --led - brightness=50 --led - slowdown - gpio=3 - f / home / pi / rpi - rgb - led - matrix / fonts / 10x20.bdf " ♥Thank you♥ " - y20--led - no - hardware - pulse
///home/pi/rpi-rgb-led-matrix/examples-api-use/scrolling-text-example -s 0 --led-rows=64 --led-cols=64 --led-chain=2 --led-brightness=50 --led-slowdown-gpio=3 -f /home/pi/rpi-rgb-led-matrix/fonts/10x20.bdf " ♥Thank you♥ "  -y40 --led-no-hardware-pulse -C25,255,200
*/

if(msg.end){
    msg.payload =""
    msg.delay = (global.get("tiktok_movie_onTime")-.100)*1000*2
    node.warn(msg.delay)
    //msg.payload = "-s10  --led-gpio-mapping=adafruit-hat --led-rows=64 --led-cols=64 --led-chain=2 --led-brightness=50 --led-slowdown-gpio=2 -f /home/pi/rpi-rgb-led-matrix/fonts/10x20.bdf  ♥Thank you!♥ -C255,0,248 -b5,2 -x2 --led-no-hardware-pulse"
    //node.warn(global.get("tiktok_Text_color_1").replace("rgb(", "").replace(")", "").replace(" ", ""))
    msg.payload = "-s" + global.get("tiktok_Text_speed_1") +
     " --led-gpio-mapping=adafruit-hat --led-rows=64 --led-cols=64 --led-chain=2 --led-brightness=" +
      global.get("tiktok_Text_brightness_1") +
      " --led-slowdown-gpio=2 -f /home/pi/rpi-rgb-led-matrix/fonts/" +
      global.get("tiktok_Text_font_1") + 
      " -C" + global.get("tiktok_Text_color_1").replace("rgb(", "").replace(")", "").replace(" ", "").replace(" ", "") +
      " -b5,2 -x" + global.get("tiktok_Text_startx_1") +
      " -y" + global.get("tiktok_Text_starty_1") +" --led-no-hardware-pulse Thank you! "
    
    node.send([msg])
//--led-no-hardware-pulse
    msg.payload = "-s" + global.get("tiktok_Text_speed_2") +
     " --led-gpio-mapping=adafruit-hat --led-rows=64 --led-cols=64 --led-chain=2 --led-brightness=" +
      global.get("tiktok_Text_brightness_2") + " --led-slowdown-gpio=2 -f /home/pi/rpi-rgb-led-matrix/fonts/" +
      global.get("tiktok_Text_font_2")  + " -C" + global.get("tiktok_Text_color_2").replace("rgb(", "").replace(")", "").replace(" ", "").replace(" ", "") +
      " -y" + global.get("tiktok_Text_starty_2") +" -x" +
      global.get("tiktok_Text_startx_2") +
      " --led-no-hardware-pulse " +
       msg.old.repeatCount +
      " X " + msg.old.giftName +
      " "
    node.send([null, msg]); 
    //--led-no-hardware-pulse
    msg.payload = "-s" + global.get("tiktok_Text_speed_3") +
     " --led-gpio-mapping=adafruit-hat --led-rows=64 --led-cols=64 --led-chain=2 --led-brightness=" 
     + global.get("tiktok_Text_brightness_3") + " --led-slowdown-gpio=2 -f /home/pi/rpi-rgb-led-matrix/fonts/" 
     + global.get("tiktok_Text_font_3") + " -C" + global.get("tiktok_Text_color_3").replace("rgb(", "").replace(")", "").replace(" ", "").replace(" ", "") 
     + " -y" + global.get("tiktok_Text_starty_3") +" -x" +
     global.get("tiktok_Text_startx_3") +" --led-no-hardware-pulse " + msg.old.uniqueId + ""
    node.send([null,null, msg]); 
            
  msg.payload = "--led-gpio-mapping=adafruit-hat --led-rows=64 --led-cols=64 --led-chain=2 --led-brightness=" +
    global.get("tiktok_Movie_brightness") +
    " --led-slowdown-gpio=2 -f -w" +
    global.get("tiktok_movie_onTime") +
    " " + 
    msg.old.filename1 +
    " -f -w" + global.get("tiktok_movie_onTime")+
    " " + 
    msg.old.filename2 +
    " --led-gpio-mapping=adafruit-hat -C --led-no-hardware-pulse"
    node.send([null,null, null, msg])
    //return msg
}
